DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 study design test ability investigational study drug ARRY-371797 reduce pain either perioperatively postoperatively third molar extraction pain model , evaluate drug 's safety . Approximately 150 subject US enrol study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study ARRY-371797 Subjects Undergoing Third Molar Extraction
DOC.criteria: Key Scheduled outpatient oral surgical procedure remove 2 ipsilateral third molar , least 1 mandibular fully partially impacted bone . Females childbearing potential must willing use acceptable method contraception within 14 day prior first dose study drug completion followup procedure . Body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Good health determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign clinical laboratory result nonclinical significance . Additional criterion exist . Key Positive urine drug screen . Use prescription nonprescription drug , herbal dietary supplement , vitamin , grapefruit juice within 14 day prior first dose study drug . Additional criterion exist .
